replies.txt_content:

应该这样写
答：
[wood] [wood] 
[wood] [wood]=[wooden_door]
[wood] [wood]
或者
[iron_ingot] [iron_ingot] 
[iron_ingot] [iron_ingot]=[iron_door]
[iron_ingot] [iron_ingot]
或者
[wood] [wood] 
[wood] [wood]=[hatch]

你少写了= =
